title: Drawing, "Advertising Design for ShurEdge Knives:  Santa Toy"
medium: Orange-red,  pink, green, black, brown, grey, and white crayon with graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite,  upper left: gifts that sure have an edge.../ for Christmas!
description: Santa Claus (a collaged cut-out) in shape of bounce-back punching toy.  He holds a box of knives in each hand and has 3 single knives and 1 boxed set of knives tucked into his belt.  Shur Edge logo (name lined across silver pointed triangle), upper right.  Caption at upper left: "gifts that sure have an edge... for Christmas!"   Series of parallel lines, indicating placement for text, at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Advertising Design for ShurEdge Knives:  Santa Toy".
Orange-red,  pink, green, black, brown, grey, and white crayon with graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-5.
